response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $7,500. This is a special opportunity to acquire a product that is worth $8,000 to you, at a highly competitive rate. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.", "product_price": 7500}
